name: Mustard Yellow Linen Loafers
description:
These simple little loafers are made with a mustard yellow linen fabric and have a cream cotton lining. The soles are fabric and the closure is an elastic loop around a tan button.

**Sizes 12-18 months and larger will be made with non-slip bottoms**

The non-slip bottoms are made with a white grippy material and can be added to any size if you would like.

All booties come wrapped in a sweet little package. If you are sending them as a gift, please let me know and I will gladly include a custom note from you.

name: Baby Boy Loafers - Orange and Gray Dot
description:
Vibrant little shoes for cute little feet! These lovely handmade shoes are made with a gray and white dot print with complimenting orange and white toes and soles. They have a white cotton lining and a white button with an elastic closure to allow for a good fit. The sole of the shoe is fabric.

I recommend measuring the bottom of the child's foot to make sure the booties will fit. The booties may be hand washed in cold water and air dried as needed for care.

**Sizes 12-18 months and larger will be made with non-slip bottoms**

The non-slip bottoms are made with a white grippy material and can be added to any size if you would like.

All booties come wrapped in a sweet little package. If you are sending them as a gift, please let me know and I will gladly include a custom note from you.
